features: SUPERSIZED BRUSH HEAD FOR SUPERIOR CLEANING - The wide oval brush head coupled with a flexible neck helps target those tricky to reach areas more easily, massaging the whole mouth as it goes for an all over tingly clean.

3X LONGER LASTING BRISTLES - Made from vegetable based nylon bristles (which in case you're wondering are BPA-free, ADA accepted) the Flex Brush lasts 3X longer than other run of the mill toothbrushes.

FLEX NECK TECHNOLOGY - The Flex Brush’s wide soft head stems from an angled neck reduces pressure on gums and teeth. Especially if you're a hard brusher. Bristles are softer and more uniquely aligned providing even pressure that reduces chronic issues.

AWARD WINNING "EASY-GRIP" DESIGN - The RADIUS Flex Brush user friendly handle complies with recommended 45 degree brush to tooth angle and the smart Thumb and Palm design makes it much easier to grip and control.
ADA ACCEPTED - Accepted by the American Dental Association. All RADIUS Toothbrushes are a must have for clean teeth & gums.
body.description: RADIUS FLEX BRUSH - The one that started it all. The luxurious RADIUS Original blends form and function seamlessly. Not only is it accepted by the American Dental Association for prevention of gingivitis and the removal of plaque. The RADIUS Original’s iconic design won it a spot in the permanent collection of the Smithsonian Institute National Design Museum.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Made with the planet in Mind From the recycled rubber handle to the vegetable-based nylon bristles, the Radius Flex Brush is friendly from the top to bottom. Award-Winning Easy-Grip User-friendly handle dentists recommend and a smart thumb-and-palm design that's easy to grip and control. Good for Lefties, Too! This flexible grip comes in right and left-handed versions and tons of colors for luxurious teeth cleaning experience that fits YOU.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I never had a toothbrush like this before. It’s absolutely phenomenal!!! It covers everything and feels so good when I brush!!!Great price and arrived so quickly!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I love this company’s travel toothbrush. At first I thought this big brush might be too big for my mouth, but I got used to it and found it worked very nicely. I currently wear Invisalign braces and have to brush like a zillion times a day, so comfort and speed in brushing helps. It’s soft, it’s easy to cover a lot of brushing territory with a quick slosh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bath brush for my hedgehog
reviews.reviewText: This is SUCH a large toothbrush I'm not sure if it would be very comfortable in your mouth. However! It is absolutely perfect as a bath brush for my hedgehog. Probably would work very well for other small pets too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It takes some getting used to but I don’t think I could ever go back to a traditional size toothbrush.🪥 I feels so comfortable in my hand. My teeth feel cleaner after, too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a very big mouthful
reviews.reviewText: 8/2023I wanted a bigger toothbrush head, maybe 3 times the usual size. This is more like 6 times the usual size. It's a very big mouthful. A much bigger head means that to press the bristles into the teeth with the same amount of force as you did with the traditional, little toothbrush, you have to push a little harder with your hand. Theoretically, the chunkier handle should make it easier to deliver force from your hand to the toothbrush head.I like to regulate the pressure that I press on my teeth with the toothbrush. In this Radius toothbrush, the thinner part of the handle flexes to assure the pressure does not exceed a certain amount. But sometimes, I'd have liked to press a little harder. Perhaps the toothbrush is smarter than me, and I should take its advice. Maybe I should always strive to flex the handle to assure I'm always exerting the proper force, as determined by Radius.The handle also has some zig-zags. I'm used to approaching my teeth with an angle determined by my arm and hand. So after a week, I'm still getting used to approaching my teeth with the strange zig-zags of this toothbrush handle.After a week, I'm still getting used to this toothbrush, trying to decide if I'll stick with it or dispose of it. The promise is getting the process, which I was never enthusiastic about, done faster with the toothbrush's huge head. So I'll keep using this toothbrush until I get used to it or give up.Least importantly, if you were ever able to hold a conversation while brushing your teeth with a traditional, little toothbrush, you won't be able to utter a single syllable anymore with a mouthful of this one.2/2024I signed up for a subscription, and my 2nd Radius toothbrush should be arriving this month. I'm still using it, no plans on giving it up. It's still a mouthful. And the default 6-month replacement seems just right; thanks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Whole Mouth Clean - Takes Some Getting Used To
reviews.reviewText: It’s our first time using one of these toothbrushes. Saw one on Shark Tank for $100. That’s a bit strap for a brush that doesn’t have tricks. So we opted to try this first.Due to an accident and head injury, teeth and mouth area are sensitive. So a softer brush is needed to avoid pain yet I like the clean feeling of a firmer toothbrush. This brush is definitely softer than a traditional and battery brush but not as soft as child’s. The bristles are firm yet flexible. For a more visual description, it’s like a car wash brush.Size - So you know this is a wide toothbrush. It takes some getting used too. While brushing you literally have a full mouth of toothbrush in there. The handle is hard for me to manage. I can’t seem to find that sweet spot for holding it. It hurts my shoulder too because having to hold this differently, you use more muscles in different places. (The $100 brush has a standard handle. Hmmmm).Time - I’m leaning towards less time to brush. The brush covers more surface including gums. But, without the battery operated spinning brush, you have to focus more on where you’re brushing. For the roof of the mouth, cheeks and tounge, this brush is much nicer and takes less time to cover all the rounded areas inside the mouth. Points for that. I always feel like I’m sawing my tongue with a normal brush. And I lose track of where I brushed to ensure full coverage so I end up redoing which takes time.Comfort - As mentioned above this takes some getting used too. 50 years of using a certain type of toothbrush, the getting used to is noticeable.Pros - Coverage area, softer brush, whole mouth clean feeling.Cons - Handle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Teeth feel much cleaner
reviews.reviewText: Soft brush that cleans sensitive teeth. PLUS Massages the gums. Feel totally clean. Superior all away around than the old single tooth brush! Worth the extra money for piece of mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023

reviews.reviewText: I love the bigger size and flexible brush head. My teeth feel very clean. Handle is comfortable to hold too.
It cleans the entire mouth - teeth and gums.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Pleased to have sourced this type of toothbrush again
reviews.reviewText: Husband loves this sort of toothbrush

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 7, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I only ever use these brushes, really good, long lasting and work really well on both gums and teeth. Good value and would certainly recommend. Thanks
Love it!! Leaves my mouth feeling very clean!! Wish they made them for my dogs too!!
